relevance_explanation: All steps are relevant to the customer. The steps related to refund are correctly removed as the customer's ticket is non-refundable and they didn't purchase insurance. The customer also has more than 30000 points so the correct branch was taken.
completeness_explanation: All necessary steps are preserved. The routine includes loyalty greetings, acknowledgement of cancellation policy, checking for blockers, calculating the fee, processing cancellation, issuing travel credit, confirming the cancellation, and completing the case. The routine handles the error cases as well.
